p: The coding sequence of MAPK-1 (1.1 kb) was cloned in pET28a (+) vector (EMD Biosciences) and transformed in BL-21 (DE3) strain of E. coli. The recombinant MAPK protein was expressed by inducing with 0.9 mM concentration of isopropyl β- d-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) which showed the maximum induction. The expressed recombinant protein was purified and loaded on to SDS-PAGE in order to check the purity along with the control (vector without candidate MAPK gene). Recombinant MAPK protein showed band of ∼40.2 kDa as visualized on the gel ( Fig. 5a). The maximum activity of recombinant MAPK protein (6.2 U/mg proteins) was observed in response to T 1 ( Fig. 5b).
